name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Horizontally scroll the layers panel in Figma

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows for horizontal scrolling in Figma's layers panel.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
這個擴充套件可以在 Figma 的圖層面板中實現橫向捲動的功能，以解決 Figma 用戶一直以來的困擾。

安裝套件後，請重新整理頁面。如要進行橫向捲動，請將滑鼠游標移至圖層面板區域，然後使用觸控板或滑鼠滾輪加上 Shift 鍵。如果第一次無法運作，再次嘗試重新整理頁面。

This extension allows for horizontal scrolling in Figma's layers panel, solving a persistent issue for its users.

After installing, refresh your page. To scroll horizontally, move the mouse cursor to the layers panel area and use the touchpad or mouse wheel + Shift key. If it doesn't work the first time, try refreshing the page.
